title: USII.9
text: The student will apply history and social science skills by
strand: Science and Technology Since the Turn of the Century
subject: United States History 1865 to the Present
course: United States History 1865 to the Present
subs: studying the iterative and ongoing advancements in science and technology; and
describing the changes in American culture related to music, art, media, and communication, as well as advancements in American economics related to banking, business, and industry.
